<@page_overview_title/> <#assign spring_service_reference=true/> <#include "../support/service_reference"> <#assign beanName=(getStringParameter("beanname"))/> <#if (pathInfo.currentPath??)> <#elseif (pageProperties["_service_filter"]??)> ${model.put("serviceReference",app.retriveSpringServiceReference(pageProperties["_service_filter"].displayableValue))} Removed monitor for beans: 
<@groovy>
	import org.xdir.platform.util.bean.BeanUtil
	def ouputstring=""
	serviceReference=model.get("serviceReference")
	serviceId=serviceReference.getProperty("service.id")
	beanName="${beanName}"
	
	<#include "../osgiframework">
	<@framework_get_spring_application_context/>
	
	monitedBeans=model.app.retriveMonitorService()?.unmonite(beanName,applicationContext.getBeanFactory())
	if(monitedBeans!=null){
		monitedBeans.each(){
			ouputstring=ouputstring+it[0]+"\n"
		}
	}
	
	return ouputstring
Ok
